code: import React from'react';import IriComp from'./concrete/IriComp';import PrefixedComp from'./concrete/PrefixedComp';import BNodeComp from'./concrete/BNodeComp';import PrimitiveComp from'./concrete/PrimitiveComp';import ShapeRefComp from'./concrete/ShapeRefComp';function ComponentTypeFactory(props){var shape=props.shape,triple=props.triple,type=props.type,instance=props.instance;if(instance=='iriRef'){return React.createElement(IriComp,{shape:shape,triple:triple,type:type});}else if(instance=='prefixedIri'){return React.createElement(PrefixedComp,{shape:shape,triple:triple,type:type});}else if(instance=='bnodeType'){return React.createElement(BNodeComp,{shape:shape});}else if(instance=='primitive'){return React.createElement(PrimitiveComp,{shape:shape,triple:triple});}else if(instance=='shape'){return React.createElement(ShapeRefComp,{shape:shape,triple:triple});}else{return null;}}export default ComponentTypeFactory;
